trans-unit.source: To get started, you'll need to grant us permission to display your files. This will open a Settings page where you can grant us this permission. You'll need to reopen the app once you've completed this step.
trans-unit.target: Om aan de slag te gaan, moet u ons toestemming geven om uw bestanden weer te geven. Hierdoor wordt een instellingenpagina geopend waar u ons deze toestemming kunt geven. U moet de app opnieuw openen zodra dit is voltooid.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.target: Vul een item naam in zonder extensie

trans-unit.source: is a subfolder of the source folder
trans-unit.target: is een submap van de bronmap

trans-unit.source: An item with this name already exists in this directory.
trans-unit.target: Een item met die naam bestaat al in deze map.

trans-unit.source: We weren't able to delete this item
trans-unit.target: We konden dit item niet verwijderen

trans-unit.source: Please insert the necessary drive to access this item.
trans-unit.target: Plaats het benodigde station om toegang te krijgen tot dit item.

trans-unit.source: The file you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: Het bestand dat u probeert te openen, is mogelijk verplaatst of verwijderd.

trans-unit.source: The file you are attempting to preview may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: De bestanden waarvan u een voorbeeld probeert te bekijken, zijn mogelijk verplaatst of verwijderd.

trans-unit.source: The folder you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: De map die u probeert te openen, is mogelijk verplaatst of verwijderd.

trans-unit.source: The file you're trying to delete is currently being used by an another application.
trans-unit.target: Het bestand dat u probeert te verwijderen, wordt momenteel gebruikt door een andere toepassing.

trans-unit.source: The requested operation is not supported
trans-unit.target: De gevraagde bewerking wordt niet ondersteund.

trans-unit.source: The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: De itemnaam mag de volgende tekens niet bevatten: \ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: Selects the best multitasking control based on how the app window is resized. When the window is small, you'll notice the horizontal tab strip is collapsed into a flyout on the navigation toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Selects the best multitasking control based on how the app window is resized. When the window is small, you'll notice the horizontal tab strip is collapsed into a flyout on the navigation toolbar.

trans-unit.source: Always hides the vertical multitasking flyout from the navigation toolbar, and shows the traditional horizontal tabstrip on the app window. This is suited for users who need to keep track of every open app instance at all times.
trans-unit.target: Always hides the vertical multitasking flyout from the navigation toolbar, and shows the traditional horizontal tabstrip on the app window. This is suited for users who need to keep track of every open app instance at all times.

trans-unit.source: Collapses the horizontal list of app instances into a vertical flyout on the navigation toolbar, designed for users who want a clean app interface with on-demand access to a multitasking experience.
trans-unit.target: Collapses the horizontal list of app instances into a vertical flyout on the navigation toolbar, designed for users who want a clean app interface with on-demand access to a multitasking experience.
